name: Beat the Buzzer
description:
Clarissa,

A trade's a trade - here’s the studio master of Beat the Buzzer, episode 4. Snagged it off a mate after the studio closed down and it’s just been gathering dust ever since. I’m not surprised they never aired it – the audio quality is terrible!

Say, while you're watching - would you mind settling a bet for us? I could've sworn the contestant was some tradie, but the missus swears she watched someone entirely different! Let us know what you think, eh?

- ████

A short, strange, pseudo-trivia game created in one week for the Dread XP Found Footage Jam.

Features:

  • Short and sweet: The tape is only a few minutes long - at first.  Derail the show or go for the grand prize to find more footage.
  • Cheat to victory: In-built notepad keeps track of discoveries between runs.
  • High quality .jpgs: Look, I had to dig the lightbox out for some of these photos, so you'd better believe they're getting their own damn bullet point.

Content warnings: (tba. while there is nothing particularly graphic in this game, be advised that this is less of a comedy than my other works.)
